 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבָנוֺן‎</span> ([[Deut.3.25|Deut 3:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלְּבָנֹן‎</span> [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]])<sub>71</sub> **proper name, of a mountain** ==Lebanon== (Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לבנן‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Labnanu***</u></abbr>, etc., [[BDB#Schr|Schr]]<sup>COT on [[1Kgs.5.13|1Kgs 5:13]]</sup>, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Par. 103 ff.</sup>; Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Ra-m­n-n***</u></abbr> [[BDB#WMM|WMM]]<sup>Asien u.Europa,197ff.</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> compare further [[BDB#Rob|Rob]]<sup>BR ii, 435ff.</sup> 493 [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]<sup>Geogr.45ff.</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr.110 and references</sup>; name probably from ***whiteness*** of its cliffs [[BDB#Rob|Rob]]<sup>BR ii, 493</sup>); — wooded mountain-range on northern border of Israel [usually with article <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלּ‎</span> (51 t.); without article<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבָנוֺן‎</span>, in poetry and late [[Hos.14.8|Hos 14:8]]; [[Nah.1.4|Nah 1:4]]; [[2Kgs.19.23|2Kgs 19:23]] = [[Isa.37.24|Isa 37:24]]; [[Ezek.31.15|Ezek 31:15]]; [[Ezek.31.16|Ezek 31:16]]; [[Isa.14.8|Isa 14:8]]; [[Isa.29.17|Isa 29:17]]; [[Isa.33.9|Isa 33:9]]; [[Isa.40.16|Isa 40:16]]; [[Jer.18.14|Jer 18:14]]; [[Hab.2.17|Hab 2:17]]; [[Zech.10.10|Zech 10:10]]; [[Zech.11.1|Zech 11:1]]; [[Ps.29.6|Ps 29:6]]; [[Song.4.8|Song 4:8]] (twice in verse); [[Song.4.11|Song 4:11]]; [[Song.4.15|Song 4:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבָב֫וֺנָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.28|1Kgs 5:28]]a]; perhaps first mentioned in defining a locality, as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַר הַלְּבָנוֺן‎</span>, [[Judg.3.3|Judg 3:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]] according to [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]; this combination only here), but also in early prophets, then in [[BDB#D|D]], and later; — in defining a locality [[Josh.9.1|Josh 9:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּקְעַת הַלּ‎</span> [[Josh.11.17|Josh 11:17]]; [[Josh.12.7|Josh 12:7]] (side of Baal Gad); as a marked feature, in describing extent of land [[Deut.1.7|Deut 1:7]]; [[Deut.3.25|Deut 3:25]]; [[Deut.11.24|Deut 11:24]]; [[Josh.1.4|Josh 1:4]]; [[Josh.13.5|Josh 13:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלהַֿל‎</span>) v[[Josh.13.6|Josh 13:6]] (all [[BDB#D|D]]), [[1Kgs.9.19|1Kgs 9:19]] = [[2Chr.8.6|2Chr 8:6]]; [[Jer.22.26|Jer 22:26]]; [[Zech.10.10|Zech 10:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁהַל‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Jer.22.6|Jer 22:6]] (figurative of royal house of Judah), as a height [[Song.4.8|Song 4:8]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגְדַּל הַל‎</span> [[Song.7.5|Song 7:5]] i.e. a tower built on Lebanon; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁלֶג ל‎</span> [[Jer.18.14|Jer 18:14]] ***snow of L.***; L. as source of streams [[Song.4.15|Song 4:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵין ל‎</span> [[Hos.14.8|Hos 14:8]] most often, however, as bearing forests, especially of cedars, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְזֵי הַלּ‎</span> [[Judg.9.15|Judg 9:15]] (in allegory; perhaps [[BDB#J|J]], according to [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]), [[Isa.2.13|Isa 2:13]]; [[Isa.14.8|Isa 14:8]]; [[Ps.29.5|Ps 29:5]]; [[Ps.104.16|Ps 104:16]], compare [[1Kgs.5.13|1Kgs 5:13]]; [[1Kgs.5.20|1Kgs 5:20]]; [[1Kgs.5.23|1Kgs 5:23]]; [[1Kgs.5.28|1Kgs 5:28]] (twice in verse); [[2Chr.2.7|2Chr 2:7]] (twice in verse); [[2Chr.2.15|2Chr 2:15]], [[2Kgs.14.9|2Kgs 14:9]] (twice in verse) = [[2Chr.25.18|2Chr 25:18]] (twice in verse) (in allegory), [[Jer.22.23|Jer 22:23]]; [[Ezek.17.3|Ezek 17:3]]; [[Ezek.27.5|Ezek 27:5]]; [[Ezek.31.3|Ezek 31:3]]; [[Ezek.31.15|Ezek 31:15]]; [[Ezek.31.16|Ezek 31:16]]; [[Zech.11.1|Zech 11:1]]; [[Ezra.3.7|Ezra 3:7]]; [[Ps.92.13|Ps 92:13]]; [[Song.3.9|Song 3:9]]; [[Song.5.15|Song 5:15]] (simile of majestic figure); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרַח ל‎</span> [[Nah.1.4|Nah 1:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּבוֺד הַלּ‎</span> [[Isa.35.2|Isa 35:2]]; [[Isa.60.13|Isa 60:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְכַרְמֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁב ל‎</span> [[Isa.29.17|Isa 29:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(יַעַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְכְּתֵי ל‎</span> with the same reference [[Isa.37.24|Isa 37:24]] = [[2Kgs.19.23|2Kgs 19:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלּ‎</span> = trees of Lebanon [[Hos.14.6|Hos 14:6]]; [[Isa.10.34|Isa 10:34]]; [[Isa.40.16|Isa 40:16]]; [[Ps.29.6|Ps 29:6]]; [[Ps.72.16|Ps 72:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Isa.33.9|Isa 33:9]] figurative, as mourning; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמַס ל‎</span> [[Hab.2.17|Hab 2:17]] i.e.*** violence done to Lebanon***, probably by cutting down its trees; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית יַעַר הַלּ‎</span> a royal mansion of Solomon, [[1Kgs.7.2|1Kgs 7:2]] and [[1Kgs.10.17|1Kgs 10:17]]; [[1Kgs.10.21|1Kgs 10:21]] = [[2Chr.9.16|2Chr 9:16]]; [[2Chr.9.20|2Chr 9:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> as home of wild beast [[2Kgs.14.9|2Kgs 14:9]] = [[2Chr.25.18|2Chr 25:18]] (in allegory); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵיחַ לְבָנוֺן‎</span>, of the odour of cedar forests [[Song.4.11|Song 4:11]], compare [[Hos.14.7|Hos 14:7]] (in simile; [[BDB#We|We]] thinks <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> here to be a specific plant).
